name: Holy Water
description: Holy water is blessed by a priest and used for protection, blessings, and reminders of baptism.

name: Rosary
description: The Rosary is a devotional prayer using beads to meditate on the mysteries of Christ.

name: Scapular
description: The Brown Scapular of Our Lady of Mount Carmel is a sign of devotion and protection.

name: Crucifix
description: The crucifix is a cross with the body of Christ, a reminder of His sacrifice.

name: Medal of St. Benedict
description: The Medal of St. Benedict is used for protection against evil and temptation.

name: Palm Branches
description: Blessed palms from Palm Sunday symbolize Christ's triumphal entry into Jerusalem.

name: Ashes
description: Ashes, imposed on Ash Wednesday, remind the faithful of mortality and repentance.

name: Candle
description: Blessed candles represent Christ as the light of the world.

name: Holy Oils
description: Sacred oils used in sacraments such as Baptism, Confirmation, and Anointing of the Sick.

name: Agua Bendita Bottle
description: A small bottle for carrying holy water, often kept at home.

name: Rosary Ring
description: A small ring with ten bumps and a cross for discreet rosary prayers.

name: Incense
description: Incense symbolizes prayers rising to heaven and is used in liturgical celebrations.
